internal.title: Getting Started
internal.description: Create HTML, handle events and bind data the fritz2 way.

internal.title: Nested Model
internal.description: Data binding of elements in deep nested models and lists is easy like a breeze in fritz2. See how to do so using lenses.

internal.title: Validation
internal.description: Include reusable validation in your stores and show the results - at your form elements for example.

internal.title: Routing
internal.description: Create a routing through your single-page-app and handle parameters (deep links).

internal.title: Remote
internal.description: Wraps the browser's api to asynchronously communicate with your backend in a more Kotlin-like way.

internal.title: Master Detail
internal.description: Use master detail pattern to separate the details section from the collection view. Includes undo and spinner.

internal.title: WebComponent
internal.description: Build WebComponents with fritz2 or use WebComponents provided by others in your projects.

internal.title: Todo MVC
internal.description: Our implementation of the TodoMVC specification. Compare fritz2 with react, vue.js, etc.

internal.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
internal.description: Demonstrates the combination of UI, logic and state with fritz2

external.title: Spring TodoMVC
external.description: TodoMVC fullstack web-application build with Spring backend

external.title: Ktor TodoMVC
external.description: TodoMVC fullstack web-application build with Ktor backend
